front.title: Citykiller
front.setup: Put Leviathan into play "Citykiller" side up. Search Leviathan's deck for Water Shadow and put it into play
front.gameplay:
When flipped to this side, destroy H hero cards
At the end of the villain turn, Leviathan deals 2 melee damage to all hero targets.
At the end of the villain turn, if Leviathan has been dealt H damage in one instance last round, flip Leviathan
front.advanced: Reduce damage dealt to Leviathan by 1

back.title: Citykiller Retaliates
back.gameplay:
At the start of the villain turn, flip Leviathan
Reduce damage dealt to Leviathan by 1
back.advanced: Whenever Leviathan would flip, play the top card of the villain deck

card.name: Water Shadow
card.text: Whenever Leviathan would deal damage to a target, this card deals that target 2 irreducible melee damage. This card is indestructible

card.name: Torrential Downpour
card.text: At the start of each hero turn, Leviathan deals that hero 1 cold damage

card.name: Lose the War
card.text: If the environment deck is ever empty, the heroes lose the game. At the end of the villain turn, remove the top card of the environment deck from the game

card.name: Faster Than You'd Think
card.text: The first time Leviathan would be dealt damage each round, prevent that damage

card.name: Impossible Strength
card.text: Increase damage dealt by villain cards by 1

card.name: Impossible Toughness
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to Leviathan by 1

card.name: Tidal Wave
card.text: Destroy all environment targets. Leviathan deals X cold damage to all non-villain targets, where X = 1 + the number of cards destroyed in this way

card.name: Cunning
card.text: Play the top 2 cards of the villain deck

card.name: Anyone Can Die
card.text: Leviathan deals the hero target with the highest HP 5 irreducible melee damage

card.name: Guile
card.text: Flip Leviathan. Play the top card of the villain deck

card.name: Whipping Tail
card.text: Leviathan deals 1 melee damage to the 2 hero targets with the lowest HP
